emotional_dysregulation_conditions.recent_shock: recent emotional shock (e.g., traumatic phone call, fear of motherhood)
emotional_dysregulation_conditions.ptsd_somatic: PTSD + somatic panic response (e.g., fear of dying, tingling)
emotional_dysregulation_conditions.adolescent_frustration: adolescent reacting strongly to interruption or sibling rivalry

SCRIPT_A.title: Healing from Shock and Preparing for Inner Peace

SCRIPT_C.title: When the world cuts me off, I remain whole

SCRIPT_D.title: I Become the Author of My Choices Again
